landing.description: Link, find and modelize your notes.
landing.video_instruction: Set to HD quality and fullscreen

link.title: Link
link.overview: Coherent mind by creating links between your different ideas. The idea is simple: cut your ideas in reusable chunks.
link.desc2: Every bubble can eventually be linked to another where ever it's located in your mind.
link.desc3: Liez vos idées à celles des autres ou à l'encyclopédie Wikipédia et bénéficiez d'images, de descriptions et d'intelligence qui enrichiront vos idées et élimineront l'ambiguïté.
link.cut: Cut your ideas into reusable chunks and link them in a thousand ways
link.article_wiki: Wikipedia article linked to your idea
link.date_identifier: Link to a calendar date and ...
link.use_calendar: Get the right tool for your type of data
link.far_link: Any bubble can be linked to another

find.title: Find
find.overview: Quickly picture the context of your notes.
find.center: Any bubble can become the center
find.meaning: List bubbles that share a common meaning
find.history: History of your most visited bubbles

model.title: Modelize
model.overview: Easy forms for your notes. Accelerate your notes taking by using already well thought models.
model.suggestion: Have suggestions of bubbles to add
model.group: Group bubbles with the same type of relation

register.title: Register
register.login: I have an account, log me in !

language.selected_languages: Languages I understand in order of preference

error.invalid: Username is invalid, it can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens
error.password_too_short: The password must have a minimum of 6 characters

forgot_password.success: The instructions to change your password were sent to you by email
forgot_password.error: No account is related to this email

error.too_short: The password must have a minimum of 6 characters
error.wrong: You can't modify your password with this link anymore

not_allowed.title: Access denied
not_allowed.about: You don't have the rights to read or modify this bubble

non_existent.title: Does not exists
non_existent.about: The bubble with given URL does not exist. It was either deleted, moved or has never existed.

identification.title: Say what this bubble is.
identification.placeholder: This bubble Is a ... or is the Same as
identification.example: ex: This bubble is a fruit or this bubble is the same as Madonna the singer.
identification.why: To automaticaly have an image, a description, suggestions, group relations and find all the other bubbles that have the same identifiers.
identification.nb_references: other bubble(s) with the same identifier
identification.no_other_references: No other bubble with the same identifier

schema.instruction: Identify a model to another bubble to use it's components.

vertex.same_bubble: Visit the same bubble but in another context

image.title: Click on the dashed area to select an image, or just drag and drop the file into the dashed area

link_to_far_vertex.title: Search for a bubble to link to

instruction.1: Drag a relation outside the box
instruction.2: to add it to your mind map

included_graph_elements.title: Bubbles and relations that compose this one

delete.title: Do you really want to remove this bubble?
